title: Riot {bug}
body: so {{champion:54}} can ult thu {{champion:78}} w its fun

replies.body: This isn't a bug, its intended. Poppy's ult will not prevent stuff that is un-ccable such as Malph, Vi and Noc Ults. [Here is a video compilation of all the dashes in LoL and the interaction with poppy W. ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u3JOjNR-eFE&list=LLsj0OdL_fKSV18bhVk4I4_A&index=9)
It's meant oto be happen. Same thing with Sion and his r
